amendment.description: An amendment increasing pay and benefits for active and reserve military personnel, including increases in Imminent Danger pay by $25 per month and Hardship Duty Pay by up to $300 per month; fund prepaid telephone cards to personnel in combat zones; fund free travel all the way to a servicemember's home and provide $25 million for loans for reservists who small businesses have been disrupted by their mobilization.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Spratt amendment (A015). The Chair sustained the point of order.
